mapper.sql: a.example_id, example_name, ispublic, label, img, file_name, favorites, a.username
mapper.select: select a.username, name, user_picture, description, example_id, example_name, label, img, favorites from account a left join example b on a.username=b.username where b.example_name like concat('%',#{exampleName},'%') order by b.favorites desc

select a.username, name, user_picture, description, a.example_id, example_name, label, img, favorites from example a left join favorites b on a.example_id=b.example_id left join account c on a.username=c.username where b.username=#{username}
